### Welcome to my project website! 
This is where I post my projects in their entirety. These projects are formatted so that readers are  <b>1)</b> taken through my data science thinking process and <b>2)</b> provided with all of the technical tools I use for these projects. 

For a more detailed summary of the projects please visit my [GitHub page](https://github.com/larylc/Independent-Projects-).

For more information about my skill set please visit my [personal website](https://cedriclary.netlify.app/).
